@realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX Wow such great being number one!!!!
In one month you've killed almost as many Americans as the Vietnam war!!!
58,220: American casualties in the Vietnam war.
56,201: American casualties due to Covid-19, of those:
52,312: Americans dead in April 2020 so far https://t.co/uWidJcM5Z6
